name: Inside Art
description:
"Inside Art" was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 26.

Kill enemies with bombs and avoid bomb explosions or you will die!
Collect coins for megabombs!
Find and kill the boss!

Controls: W/A/S/D to move, left mouse for normal bomb, right mouse for mega bomb.

by David Weikersdorfer -- @danvil -- Ludum Dare entry page
